DND5E.ShortRestHint: On a short rest you automatically reduce your temporary Corruption by your proficiency bonus.
ROS.ShortRestResult: {name} is done resolving a succesful short rest spending {dice} Hit Dice to recover {health} Hit Points.
ROS.ShortRestResultShort: {name} is done resolving a succesful short rest. No Hit Points gained
RoS.ShortRestStep1: {name} has started to resolve a succesful short rest and lowered their Temporary Corruption by {tempcorr}
ROS.LongRestHint: Take a long rest? On a long rest you will recover hit points, half your maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
ROS.LongRestResult: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points and {dice} Hit Dice.
ROS.LongRestResultHitDice: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {dice} Hit Dice.
ROS.LongRestResultHitPoints: {name} is done resolving a succesful long rest and has recovered {health} Hit Points in total.
ROS.LongRestResultShort: {name} is done resolving a succesful long rest. No Hit Points gained
ROS.LongRestStep1: {name} has started to resolve a succesful long rest, lowered their Temporary Corruption by {tempcorr}, and regained {health} Hit Points
ROS.CorruptionGain: {name} has gained {spellCorr} Temporary Corruption points by casting {spellName}
